metadata.title: CVE-2017-15115 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The sctp_do_peeloff function in net/sctp/socket.c in the Linux kernelbefore 4.14 does not check whether the intended netns is used in a peel-offaction, which allows local users to cause a denial of service(use-after-free and system crash) or possibly have unspecified other impactvia crafted system calls.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15115` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-10-generic - 4.15.0-10.11
linux-image-4.15.0-10-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-10.11
linux-image-4.15.0-10-lowlatency - 4.15.0-10.11
linux-image-extra-4.15.0-10-generic - 4.15.0-10.11
No subscription required

No subscription required
